nodes.text: Bescane was a planet near Dantooine, run by Galentro Heavy Works. A cool, temperate world, it was overpopulated and covered in factories, its natural environment destroyed.

By 4 ABY, the planet had become an Imperial fortress world. After the Battle of Endor, the system fell under control of the Pentastar Alignment, and in 12 ABY, under control of the Imperial Remnant. By the time of the Yuuzhan Vong War, Bescane was a fortress world of the Imperial Remnant. The system was attacked by the Yuuzhan Vong in 28 ABY.
